review_text: Jon's place was as advertised. Very clean and modern. It was safe and easy to find. Good location if visiting local hiking and waterfalls. Would definitely stay again.
Second stay and will continue to use this listing when I’m home so long as it’s available!

We booked the weekend for our 22nd wedding anniversary and it was incredible! I suprised my wife with this airbnb and she was blown away. She talked about how perfectly it was designed, she wants to use the same designer for our home!
The fire place was incredible as it was for the living room and bedroom. The place is meticulously clean and within walking distance to multiple local restaurants/coffee houses.
The host was very responsive and helpful prior to booking and during our stay.
Thank you for helping make make it a Great Anniversary Weekend!
The place was great! Would definitely stay here again.
Jon's place was absolutely amazing. Super convenient location and such a beautiful home. We definitely will stay again when we come to Algood for our next visit! Thank you so much Jon!!
I loved it everything was great looked exactly like the photos shown I wanted to stay longer !
Very nice and cozy. Very clean and a great place to stay…one of our favorite air BnBs!!!
5-stars! This place is a gem!! Very unique, comfortable, and modern. Worth every penny!

We were in absolute shock of how beautiful this home is. You did an incredible job creating this unique home. It's truly a work of art. We appreciate all the fine details. This was our first ever AirB&B stay. We live 20 minutes away but decided to celebrate our second anniversary here as a stay-cation. The fire place was a perfect romantic touch. Thank you for the refreshments. We will definitely be back! As well as spread the word of your immaculate place! Thanks again!
I can say Jon and Judy are great hosts. They really care for the property and the business. I highly recommend this stay!
This place was absolutely perfect! Easy drive to everything we wanted to do. Restaurants, movies, coffee shops, wal mart. Everything was “down the road”. The fireplace was my favorite part!!
Everything was as described in the listing, very clean and comfortable! Will for sure look to stay here again when in the area
Exactly like photos listed. Great space. Appreciated the snacks and drinks left out for guests.

I would suggest that there's not another Airbnb in the Cookeville area that even comes close to this place.
Large easy parking felt more like that very upscale home than an Airbnb
Great stay! Clean, modern, easy check in and check out. Highly recommended.
Great place, very comfortable. Would stay again.
This was the cutest little Airbnb. The tall ceilings and windows made it feel super cozy and fancy! We will definitely be booking again!!!
Jon’s place was perhaps our favorite AirBnB we have ever stayed at. Everything was absolutely perfect and we felt right at home. We have family in Cookville, and will be returning within the year!
Classy and clean! We enjoyed staying here (especially the fireplace). When I had a question, the response was immediate and helpful.
My wife and I absolutely loved this place. Very modern and it was impeccably clean. We will definitely be back.
Everything was as described. Nice, clean and in a nice area. An early check in was no problem. I would definitely stay there again.
This was an absolutely perfect stay! Jon is an amazing host!
Loved the space. Very clean and cozy with the fireplace. Easy to get to
Fantastic and unique airbnb. Feels like an observatory with large wrap windows and a wrap around deck. Hosted christmas with my family and everyone loved the space. Would be happy to rent again.
Absolutely beautiful, clean and had everything you could possibly need for yours stay!
Looked just like the pictures! Had a great stay. Loved the fireplace.
Classy place that matches the pictures . We enjoyed our time there and slept well in that comfy bed. The fireplace was a bonus as it was chilly
Beautiful clean stunning space! Great location and private! The host went above and beyond our expectations and made us feel so special for our honeymoon! Highly recommend!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this Airbnb, and it was an absolute delight! The cleanliness and modern design of the space exceeded my expectations.
The property is not only perfect for a relaxing getaway but would also be fantastic for hosting events (if that’s an offering). Every detail has been carefully considered, making the experience truly memorable.
I only wish our schedule allowed us to stay longer! The attention to detail and the abundance of thoughtful amenities made our stay incredibly comfortable.
I can't wait to return and enjoy this exceptional Airbnb again. A big thank you to the host for providing such a wonderful experience.
the place was amazing! the quality and caliber of the house felt like I had gotten a great deal with the price I paid. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend!

This was one of the mot beautiful airbnbs I've ever stayed at! Every small detail made the living spaces so cozy and homey. The price was also amazing for such a beautiful space. I can't wait to stay there again for my next work trip!

This is one of the best AirBnb’s that we’ve stayed in! It was immaculate, in a nice location, quiet, easy check-in & accommodating to our requests. The fireplace was awesome and was so nice to use at night when it was cold. It’s very modern and so nice. I can’t say enough good things about this place!
Our stay was perfect! The place was immaculately clean, and the little touches like snacks in the fridge and toiletries in the bathroom were very nice! I would 100% recommend staying here!
Awesome place to stay. Jon made it an excellent visit and was extremely responsive and very accommodating.

Jon’s place was hands down one of our favorites! It is the perfect place to spend a weekend away. From design to cleanliness, you can tell Jon cares about his guests and their experience. I couldn’t recommend it enough.
Great place. I wish I could’ve stayed longer. The host is great and responsive

Cozy apartment with modern convinces. Well equipped kitchen to cook dinner. Beautifully decorated. Great outdoor space. Check in/out is easy. Nice touch of drinks and snacks at check in. Close to state parks for hiking. Will definitely stay again if we come back to the area.
Nice and quite

Everything as described and more. Great location for home base of a motorcycling vacation for several reasons...centrally located for riding the curvy roads in the Tennessee hills, comfortable accommodations for relaxing in the evenings, walking distances to several restaurants after hours in the saddle, and the unexpected bonus of covered parking for our motorcycles. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely book with Jon again.
This Airbnb is absolutely stunning! 10/10 recommend!
Great
Loved this beautiful space. Had everything you need and more. Highly recommend!
Absolutely beautiful place. Very clean and comfortable. Perfect place for a close getaway for our wedding weekend.

Our stay was great! The space was designed beautifully and was the cleanest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. There were nice touches from the host (snacks and drinks). The location is really peaceful and safe. The only area we would encourage improvement would be host responsiveness. Aside from delays in responses, our stay was incredible. Would definitely recommend this space.

This was mine and my husbands first visit to Tn and this place was absolutely perfect! Everything was spotless and every room has some pretty cool features. Overall we enjoyed ourselves and we will highly recommend this to anyone coming to the area.
Jon’s place was fresh, clean, nicely decorated. We really enjoyed the deck.
Was so cute and perfect! Had everything you you needed.

Wow, just wow! Jon's place was AMAZING. Incredibly clean, impeccably decorated, and every detail addressed with perfection. Very much appreciated the small extra touches as well, such as the snacks and refreshments. This was probably one of THE BEST properties we have ever been to. We took pictures of multiple features of the rooms that we hope to incorporate into a new house and/or renovation.
Thanks for a great stay and the ideas!!
This was a great place to stay! Although this spot is more on the Algood side, it was minutes away from grocery stores and other amenities. Would definitely stay again!
This was a beautiful property. Private, clean, and safe. Would love to stay here again.
We were Friday, Saturday and Sunday to my husband and my charm
Just as described in listing. Modern, clean, comfortable and nice amenities. Centrally located and steps away from a rail trail for exercise. Have stayed twice and will be back.
The space was absolutely stunning! Spotless and had everything you needed! I highly recommend!
Great place. Quiet & convenient.

John's place is amazing! It is very modern in the middle of a small town. The cleanliness and freshness of the place was superb. We loved all the openess of the living room and kitchen that is enhanced by all of the large windows. We wish we could pick it up and place it in our hometown so we could live in it full time! We hope to return one day!

From the moment we arrived, we were thoroughly impressed with Jon's place. It is exactly as described... actually "better" than we expected...and we had high expectations! :)
It was the perfect accommodation for 2 people. Super easy to communicate with Jon or the point of contact Judy. Can't wait for our return visit! Thank you!

The place was great. We were very happy with the décor, the location, and its cleanliness.
The owners are very nice people. I'll be back.
Excellent stay! Loved it!!!
Jon’s place was very clean & modern. AAA+++
Very cool and modern place to stay
Jon's place is amazing. Everything was amazing; there were so many small details that made the stay awesome! He was easy to contact with quick responses. I highly recommend this place!!
The place was just a described and in a wonderful area to access many areas.

The apartment is absolutely stunning . It’s definitely a must stay if needing a place in the area. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely recommend to friends and family. You can eat off the floors it’s spotless, you will not be disappointed. 😊
Excellent layout. It has a very comfortable design and the amenities were more than needed. Jon, was an excellent host and I was anxious to give this review. You can’t go wrong with this place!

We absolutely loved the apartment, it’s gorgeous. Everything was clean, and the bed is really comfortable. The drinks and snacks were such a special touch. We enjoyed our time hiking in the cookeville area at the Waterloo property and Burgess Falls. We also loved Crawdaddy’s restaurant downtown. We would love to come back!
Gorgeous! Loved it!

Very nice, modern yet comfortable home. Well stocked with extras like drinks and toiletries in case you forgot yours. The outside deck was so nice and bed was very comfortable! I’ve been to a lot of Airbnb’s and I was impressed with this one.. very nice!

Beautiful modern home with amazing wraparound deck and all the amenities. Far enough away from city to relax but close enough to get to all the restaurants and shopping you could want. Beautiful Cummings Falls hiking and swimming less than 20 minutes away. Host is friendly and accommodating. Available if you have any needs but respectful of privacy. Loved the home, atmosphere, hospitality, location, everything. Most definitely did not disappoint.
Jon’s place was very relaxing, clean very well decorated. Highly recommend! TJ
this place was very well kept and cozy. it was the perfect size for my partner and I. definitely would recommend if you're visiting cummins falls

We had a great time. The place had everything we needed and it was really clean. The location was wonderful only a few minutes from Cummings falls and a short ride to several other waterfalls. Thanks . We will definitely be back

This is the second time we have stayed at a property owned by Kevin and Sherri. Loved walking the property, enjoying the peaceful views. We saw 3 deer on one of our morning walks! We would definitely stay again.

Kevin and Sherri’s place was exactly as described. It is in a quiet, rural setting. Very close to Cummins Falls State Park and about 25 minutes to Burgess Falls State Park. A short 10-12 minute drive takes you into Cookeville where there is a grocery store and several nice restaurant choices. We found the beds comfortable, and had everything we needed. Check-in was very simple. Would highly recommend this Airbnb.
One of the best places I have stayed in a long time.
It was perfect for our weekend getaway.
Great place and very comfortable. Gorgeous neighborhood and worked well for our group of six. Thank you!
This place was Beautiful and quiet. Feels just like home. We had no issues and the host were excellent. We will be back in the future
so clean!!!! There are no tvs in the bedrooms, which I love. This makes everyone spend time together. 10/10
The house met our needs perfectly for our brief stay in Cookeville. It was comfortable!

Absolutely beautiful, clean, loved the quiet and privacy. This is a place I would love to own and live in! Other than food, there was everything we needed for our stay. We slept well and were very comfortable on our 3 nights away from home. We thank you for sharing your home.
Linda
Elida, Ohio
It was easy to check in and very clean.
We had a great time at Kevin and Sherri’s place! It is a peaceful and private area that held our group comfortably.

Kevin and Sherri's place was just lovely. More than enough room for our party of 4. Very clean and very updated.
Would stay here again!

This was a lovely place to stay for the night as we traveled across the country. I would highly recommend this home to any travelers. I wish the hand held shower had been lower for a shorty like me. I wish there had been a recycling trash can.
Lovely house, beautiful area- highly recommended!
Beautiful place
a peaceful bliss

We had a great stay and loved the surroundings. Everything was just as described. Super easy checkout guidelines and we were notified when the home was ready in case we arrived before checkin time. Would definitely stay here again.
Loved the place and was just as expected. Peaceful and relaxing.

Everything was as described. Very clean home, plenty of towels and extras. Very thoughtful things like children’s diapers, extra sponges for the kitchen and plenty of trash bags and paper towels. Just the most small but thoughtful things really made this place special. Thank you for having us!

I loved this house and only regret only staying one night. It was really in a beautiful location in country, but close enough to run to town for dinner. The house was so cute and perfect for our family. Beds were comfortable, pillows superb, and house was clean! Definitely would return!

it was a great place to stay and if you were going to be there more than overnight it would be better. We were traveling to Ohio so we only stayed there overnight both going and returning home and it had a lot of 2 way roads to get there and continue on to Ohio and returning from Ohio. It was not quite as bad returning home.
Idyllic farmhouse getaway. My family and I enjoyed that it was a peaceful, well maintained, private spot in the country. we hope to be back sometime soon - it was so restful!!

A very nice cozy country place to stay. This would be great "get away from it all" for a few days, just to enjoy the peaceful country surroundings.
We were only there over night, but we enjoyed our stay. I highly recommend it.
It was a great stay
Second stay here this past weekend. Always a great experience!
Helpful, friendly hosts, loved our stay!
Great stay. Thanks!
A great cozy and cute home. Beautifully decorated and very clean. Would definitely stay again. .
We stay here each year. It’s very comfortable and peaceful.
Perfect place for our quick trip! Just a few miles from campus and new places to eat. We felt right at home and enjoyed our stay.
We really enjoyed our stay. Everything was clean and the location was private and very pretty!

This home is extremely clean, well decorated, and loaded with things you may need!
Kevin and Sherri are extremely responsive and nice.
This home was the perfect setting for me, my husband, son, daughter-in-law, and grandsons to spend a little quality time together. I am extremely thankful for the time, and it makes it so much better being in a comfortable home ♥️.
5 ⭐️s and 5 ♥️s

My wife and I stayed here during a business trip. The home was perfect for us and exactly as described. The host Sherri was very kind and very helpful during our stay. We would stay again if ever in the area.
This place was just what we needed. Kevin and Sherri were so great. We will definitelybe back.
Great place to stay!
Very clean, beautiful scenery.
Thank you for a great stay. Kevin and Sherri were very responsive. It was comfortable and had everything we needed. Thank you. Would definitely recommend.
Nice place to stay. We loved it 😊
We love having our own landing pad when we visit family and this home was perfect!!
This place was great. Very quiet and peaceful. Country surrounding, but still close to the city if Cookeville. We've stayed before and will again. Thank you.
Nice place, bath. Bed, and kitchen well supplied. Very responsive host.
What a safe, peaceful, and pleasant home Kevin and Sherri have. Any time we are in or traveling through the Cookeville area we will seek out this hidden gem. You can’t go wrong staying at the Den.

We had a great weekend getaway in Cookeville at The Den! The house was perfect for our family and wasn't far out of town. It was such a nice place to stay! I've already recommended it to friends. Kevin and Sherri answered any questions we had very quickly. We visited state parks, explored downtown, and ate at some wonderful restaurants. Such a nice rental in a great town!

There were three older ladies and we felt safe. The beds were very comfortable and clean bedding with plenty of blankets in the closet. Plenty of towels too. We enjoyed the peaceful surroundings and seen some deer in the backyard. We would stay here again. Thank you
We were happy to have found this gem near Cookeville and guarantee we will be back!
Great stay! Very private and secluded! Had everything we needed!
Stayed here for a night on our way back down to Florida. Amazing stay. Beautiful location, quiet and private. We felt right at home in the cozy stay. Would 100% stay here again if in the area!

This was our second stay here, and it was just as perfect as the first. While we are using the house mostly as a place to sleep while in the area for an event, it would be a great place to stay with more time to spend. However, even for our purposes, it is affordable with room to spread out, and in such a quiet and beautiful area. While you are very much off the beaten path, it is very accessible to TTU and all off Cookeville. Perfectly clean and comfortable.

Kevin and Sherri accommodated us for one night as we were passing through. We were delighted to pull up to a beautiful home and yard. After hours of traveling my family enjoyed the spacious yard and back patio as the sun set. The house was absolutely perfect! Modern, clean and welcoming

My fiancé and I traveled down here for our engagement pictures. Kevin and Sherri allowed us to take pictures at their barn and it was absolutely beautiful! They were very friendly and the home was perfect and clean!

We loved it! Nothing to complain about at all. Stocked with all the essentials you will need. They even had a nice little coffee basket which I loved. We brought our little furry pup and she loved it too! Thanks Kevin and Sherri for a nice place to stay while we traveled there to attend a weddings.
Wonderful stay! Definitely worth the money from all aspects ! Clean, updated country home 😊 We will be back !
Perfect stay for what we needed. Very nice and clean felt homey

We stayed at Kevin & Sherri’s 3 bedroom house. It was perfect for us. We were in town for the Tennessee Tech parent’s weekend and the campus was only a short drive away. The house was super clean which is a must and with 3 bedrooms our college students were able to stay with us. BONUS :)
Very clean place! Everything was as described in the photos! Very peaceful and private. Nice place!
We have stayed at Kevin and Sheri’s Airbnb before and it does not disappoint! Clean, comfortable and quiet!
Loved it so much!! So beautiful and peaceful! Very close to the waterfall! We loved sitting on the porch watching the deer.
We loved our stay here! Pictures do not do it justice. Everything is new, and clean. The surroundings are serene and quiet, but close enough to town. Highly recommend!!

Great hosts! Very fast to respond. Very clean space with comfy beds, the 6 of us adults all enjoyed our stay and our 1 year old loved exploring the yard and finding sticks and pinecones. This was perfect and peaceful.
Sherri was very responsive and the home was very clean and overall a great place to stay.

This was my first experience with an Airbnb, and it did not disappoint! I was just looking to take a break from the chaos of work and home with my mom and kids, and this was perfect. Clean, cozy and peaceful. After recently losing my grandmother it was a great getaway to relax and reset. Kevin and Sherri were great hosts. Thank you for sharing this great home with us, we will definitely be back!
Great location

The home is gorgeous and very quiet and peaceful. We appreciated the opportunity to stay and the convenience as we traveled through the area. Comfortable bed too!
We hope to stay again in the future!

The Den was perfect:: easy to get to, yet a private & peaceful oasis! Everything we needed - comfortable beds, ample living space, beautiful property, updated kitchen with all the amenities and wi-fi strong enough for our teen daughter to get her T Swift tickets (if you know, YOU KNOW!). Great location-less than 1/2 hr to burgess fall state park & windows overlook (highly recommend both if you can’t get entrance to Cummings Falls or want to get your steps in somewhere less crowded!)
We were in town for a wedding and when it began to storm an hour before the ceremony, I messaged the hosts, hoping there was an umbrella on property; they promptly delivered one in less than 5 minutes!! So appreciative of their response and their care to detail of this property. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
It was a very beautiful experience and the house is beautiful. They made me want to stay there

This is my second summer staying here for 2 weeks. I love the area with its peaceful beauty and easy access to town and many area state parks. We were able to visit the nearby Burgess Falls and Cumberland Mt. State Parks. Sherri and Kevin know how to run AirBNB’s well. The home is clean, organized and free of clutter with extra cabinet space for our own things. The kitchen is well stocked with exactly what you need to cook almost any meal. In fact, most Airbnb’s do not have sharp knives to peel and chop with; however, the knife set there is extremely sharp and I was able to find the same set to bring home to FL from a nearby store. I plan to come every year! You won’t be disappointed!! The A/C unit died while I was there but was also fixed and replaced during my stay. Fans were brought over so no problem staying cool. Hosts are very responsive!!

We felt so at home at The Den. My son & I and our pup so enjoyed our treks at nearby Cummins Falls & would come back to The Den grateful for the clean space & the peaceful setting & the great nights’ sleep.
Kevin & Sherri thought of everything.
This was a very restorative, beautiful getaway.
We would definitely book with Kevin & Sherri again & will maybe bring more of our family since the 3 bedrooms & 2 baths make for a spacious vacation home.
Also have to mention the beds were super-comfortable, not too hard or soft… just perfectly firm & clean!

This house was the perfect place to stop after a long drive! Loved everything about it. Clean, spacious, comfortable. We slept well and were ready to hit the road again the next day. Only wished we had been able to stay longer.
Perfect accommodations for our stay in Cookeville. The house was very clean and updated. The hosts provided everything we needed with plenty of towels and bedding.
Easy to check-in, clear instructions, and clean home. Beautiful surroundings. Very private. About 15 minutes to restaurants.
Beautiful home. Very clean and comfortable. If we're in the area again, we'd be delighted to stay there again.
A back patio table would be nice - other than that we’ll done y’all!!!

My family and I loved the house! We felt right at home and enjoyed our stay. We’re not used to having to drive thru winding roads and believe me there’re are so many winding roads leading to the place but worth the drive. We saw bunnies, deer, peacocks and several different birds while hanging out on the deck. The beds and couches were comfortables and the kitchen was spacious. The appliances are up to date. Beautiful location and house.

Quick stop here on our way through a cross country move. Very clean which is always of utmost importance to me. Quiet area and a big yard for our pups to sniff around. We had breakfast at a cute place called Soul Craft Coffee that we would recommend. We would definitely stay here again if we ever cross paths this way again 😊
Very nice place and a 100% recommended stay and a very comfortable stay.
We loved our stay! Clean and quiet home with beautiful views!! We did see a snake along the tree line when we were out exploring in the backyard. Home was great and would definitely stay again.

We are two couples traveling together and this was the perfect space for us. The house was really clean, nicely decorated, a very peaceful setting in a perfect location. We have already mentioned coming back to the area and would definitely look to stay here again. Owners were also very quick to respond when we had a question. It was a pleasure to stay here!! Thanks Kevin and Sherri for sharing your home with us!
Beautiful and peaceful space! Great for family retreat and visiting TTU.

Kevin and Sherri provided a place that felt so comfortable from the moment we walked in. Serenity keeps coming to mind to describe our stay. They provided all the essentials and then some to make ourselves quickly at home. When asked, they were helpful in suggesting local places to eat. I enjoy being able to cook while away and their kitchen was a dream for me. I even enjoyed listening to our favorite music through Alexa in the refrigerator while I made our food. The back porch was a peaceful place to drink coffee in the morning in the shade of a big and beautiful oak tree.
Kevin and Sherri are great hosts and I would not hesitate to stay at their place again.
Kevin and Sherry’s Place is great, quiet and confortable. If you are looking for a nice place to relax, feel at home and sorrounded by nature this should be your first choice.

We only stayed one night but we had a great stay. The home is pristine, free of clutter, comfortable primary with an en suite, everything is new. Very comfortable bed and linens. Sherri was extremely responsive when we had a question. The place is off the beaten path but accessible to all major vendors and highway within 15 minutes. Highly recommend.

Beautiful home and property! The house is spacious and has everything you could possibly need. On the second night, there was a problem with the AC. The host responded immediately and sent a technician out. It was fixed in a jiffy and worked perfectly after that. We couldn’t have been happier with our stay.
This is the second time that we've stayed at this property. Quiet, peaceful location. Clean cute house. We will definitely stay again when in the area.

Stayed here to visit Cummins Falls over the long weekend and the house was wonderful.
The house was easy to find when we got there late in the evening thanks to the light up address sign, which is something more places really need to look into.
The house was perfect for hanging out with a few friends, and the kitchen had everything I needed to make a few meals, and plenty of towels and soap were provided for the kitchen and bathrooms.
Would love to stay here again anytime I'm in the area!

This place was a bit out there, as far as drive from the highway, but it was extremely quiet and felt very safe. The beds were very comfortable, and a very workable kitchen! our son loved playing on the back deck and backyard! the deck would have been a beautiful place to relax if we had arrived earlier.
We arrived very late at night and I had no qualms about my family's safety in the dark, and the place was extremely easy to find an enter.
We would definitely stay here again!

This was a very peaceful place. It was easy to check in and everything organized neatly.
Nice stay.
Perfect place to enjoy nature and peaceful outdoors space. We only had a night stay but would definitely be back for a longer stay.
Great stay as always!!!!
Very clean and well appointed house in a beautiful peaceful setting. Will definitely stay again!

My family and I stayed for the weekend and it was the perfect place! We grilled out, had a fire, and seen all types of wildlife on the property, which we loved! We would definitely recommend staying here and we can’t wait to come back!!
Thank you Kevin and Sherri for having such a beautiful home and being such great host!😊

This was our second time staying and noticed all the Great upgrades. It was very nice prior as well. Great location and very beautiful surroundings. The Host are very responsive and easy to work with. Would definitely stay again!
Worked out great for our family! Exactly what we were looking for!
Very nice and updated place
Lovely home. Comfortable beds. Nice outdoor deck. Clean and comfortable

Beautiful, comfortable home just minutes from Cummins Falls. it was the perfect place to kick back and relax after a day of hiking. I sat out on the porch and watched bunnies hop across a field in the mornings and listened to a chorus of springtime frogs at night. it was a great stay and I'd love to come back again.

Very nice and comfortable home in a peaceful country setting. Was great for our two dogs that were traveling with us. They had a nice area to run around and get some fresh air! Beds are super comfy. This was a stop off for us driving to South Carolina. Served the purpose very well. Beautiful country side.
If you are traveling with dogs, just to note there was a a pit bull looking dog being walked off lead by some neighbors. Just make sure the coast is clear before you take your dogs out. We had no issues as we were inside when they went by.

Kevin and Sherri's place was absolutely BEAUTIFUL. We traveled 9 hours from Michigan and the house was way beyond our expectations. We had one issue with ants (it is spring time so that is to be expected) and the AC. Kevin and Sherri were not able to come check it out themselves however sent Sasha who was absolutely WONDERFUL. She was quick and responsive, sprayed for ants, and was will to get someone out to fix the AC first thing in the morning. However, it worked it's self out and the AC started working. We had a Wonderful week staying here and will DEFIANTLY be returning in the future.
Great place! Clean and nice beds. Would definitely stay again.
Beautiful, peaceful, comfortable home! Enjoy our stay and would definitely stay again!
Beautiful country home.
A great place to stay. 10/10 would recommend!
Great place to stay!!

Very nicely updated ranch style home — VERY clean. Number of beds and baths was ideal for our family of 5 and our little Maltipoo, Dolly. We did have a slight problem with ants coming through back deck door and getting into some items we had on the kitchen counter, but owner was sweet to ask if we wanted compensation for the lost snacks. Hopefully they sprayed / took care of this issue after we left. This house is extremely close to Cummins Falls, so perfect for hikers, yet close enough to Cookeville to be able to go out for dinner. [Crawdaddy’s downtown was awesome!]
I would suggest that owners add another chair in the family room area - not enough seating options for our family to be comfortable. That is the only negative feedback I have. (and I wouldn’t even classify that as negative, honestly)
exactly as described and very comfortable ! would definitely visit again!
Beautiful, renovated house. Perfect space for hanging out with our kids. A quick drive from Cookeville.
they were great had a problem with the backdoor and with in a hour they came by to fix it 5 star beautiful area and home

I hate to tell you how awesome this place is because I always want to stay here when we run at Cummins Falls. (Dibs for 2024 lol). Very comfortable. We have stayed here a few times and it feels very welcoming.
Great stay comfy beds :))
Nice place

Our daughter's had little appreciation for the dog hair found in their bed and washcloths... we usually look for no pets specifications. In our opinion, we should not be subjected to sleeping with someone's dog or cat or the after effects. I guess we learned our lesson.
This is not meant to a bad reflection on the house or the hosts. It is a nice house and a nice area. A little ways from the interstate but peaceful surroundings.
The house is in excellent condition, everything is very clean and new. Location is extremely peaceful, a great place to have some quality time with family. Thank you so much to our excellent hosts!
We loved staying in Kevin and Sherri’s place! It was clean, so accommodating, and a beautiful piece of property. We loved staying here and will be back again!

This was our 4th stay at one of Kevin and Sherri's properties. And we will definitely be back! The house was very clean, homie and comfortable. Kevin and Sherri go the extra mile with their property to make sure it has everything and more that one would need. The surrounding area is very beautiful and peaceful. Kevin and Sherri are very responsive and great to work with. We were able to add two days on to our stay when bad weather delayed our return home to Michigan. Thanks for the great stay Kevin and Sherri!

Great stay! Very clean!
Thank you!
We will be back!
My friends and I had a kid free weekend getaway and this place was perfect! The house was amazing, the location was peaceful and we had a relaxing and fun weekend. We will definitely be returning!

This was a beautiful and peaceful stay. I would definitely stay again. The home is lovely spacious and quiet. If you don’t like winding roads I would be sure to travel in the day time. Bring food with you before hand because the drive to the store is a little ways. I needed to contact the host once during the stay and they were quick to respond.
